headline: Better Buy Now: A 50/50 Split of Costco and Walmart or Dollar General and Dollar Tree?
summary: Dollar General and Dollar Tree are surging after their earnings reports.  Walmart and Costco have sustained steady growth despite weak consumer spending.  After reaching multi-year lows in 2024, Dollar General (NYSE: DG) and Dollar Tree (NASDAQ: DLTR) are staging epic recoveries in 2025.

headline: Walmart to Broaden Drone Delivery Service to Three Additional States
summary: Walmart Inc. (NYSE:WMT) is one of the best Dow stocks to invest in. The company is expanding its drone delivery service to three additional states, aiming to boost convenience for its customers. The retail giant announced plans to roll out the service at 100 locations over the next year in cities including Atlanta, Charlotte, Houston, […]

headline: 3 Resilient Retail Stocks That Are Still Growing Amid Tariffs
summary: The tariff risk is a big one for retailers.  It can spike costs significantly for businesses, forcing them to either pass on those increases to consumers, or absorb them, resulting in leaner profits.  On May 15, big-box retailer Walmart released its latest quarterly results, for the period ending April 30.
